author: Eric Stephen
title: 2016-2017 MLB trade rumors offseason tracker
text:
Every important trade and rumor in one location
The winter meetings in National Harbor, Maryland brought quite a lot of action — Chris Sale traded to the Red Sox, Adam Eaton traded to the Nationals — but the offseason is far from over.
There is plenty of time left in the hot stove season, as MLB teams work the phones and make moves until pitchers and catchers report to spring training in February.
In addition to the various free agents with new contracts , the offseason is full of several trades as well. And for every completed trade, there are several rumors, which we will track here for the next several months this offseason.
